long_description: This Yakima S.U.P. Brah strap system lets you strap down your stand-up paddleboard and other board styles to your car roof rack. Attach board to vehicle with the bow strap and stern strap (each 139 in. long); straps feature metal cam buckles and 2 metal hooks. 1 center strap (135 in. long) comes with plastic ladder lock buckle. 2 loop straps (each 60 in. long) each go around board. Straps to lash board securely onto car rack system are required (sold separately); Yakima recommends RipCord or Heavy Duty Straps.
short_description: This Yakima S.U.P. Brah strap system lets you strap down your stand-up paddleboard and other board styles to your car roof rack.
